name: constraints-dsl-compiler
description: Typescript compiler for the constraints DSL

scripts.generate-doc: rm -rf build/docs; npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-extras --customTitle "AERIE DOCUMENTATION" --customTitleLink ../index.html src/libs/constraints-edsl-fluent-api.ts --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --out ./build/docs --name "Constraints eDSL documentation"
